description:
Koiwai Homare is http://anidb.net/ch90776 [Yuuta]`s co-worker and http://anidb.net/ch90777 [Moriko]`s former co-worker. He and Moriko used to have a long-distance working relationship and never met her personally while she was employed. He holds Moriko in high regard as an employee and was upset when she suddenly decided to quit her job leading him to find another job at the trading company Yuta works at.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Koiwai Homare
